txheej qhia: Kev sau cov lus txib CPU tuaj yeem nkag siab
sau npe: Me me, super-ceev nco qhov chaw nyob hauv CPU
arithmetic logic unit: Ib feem ntawm CPU ua haujlwm suav
tswj tsev: Coordinates cov kev ua ntawm lub computer lub Cheebtsam
nyeem nkaus xwb: Khaws cov lus qhia uas tseem ceeb rau lub computer pib
cache nco: Me me, nco ceev ze rau CPU kom nkag tau sai
moos ceev: Tus nqi ntawm CPU ua cov lus qhia
lus loj: Tus naj npawb ntawm cov khoom CPU tuaj yeem ua tiav ib zaug
cov kav dej: Cov txheej txheem qhov twg CPU rhuav cov lus qhia mus rau theem ua haujlwm ntawm ntau qhov ib zaug
multiprocessing: Siv ntau lub CPU lossis cores los ua haujlwm ib txhij
cuam tshuam: Lub teeb liab uas ncua ib ntus rau CPU los daws qhov xwm txheej
virtual nco: Cov txheej txheem siv qhov chaw hard disk ua qhov txuas ntxiv ntawm RAM
bios: Basic Input/Output System, firmware uas pib lub hardware thaum pib
i/o port: Qhov chaw nyob tshwj xeeb ntawm lub computer rau kev sib txuas lus nrog cov khoom siv peripheral
ntaus ntawv tsav tsheb: Software uas tso cai rau lub operating system tswj ib tug ntaus ntawv
kev txom nyem: Qhov kev txiav txim uas bytes khaws cia hauv nco
network raws tu qauv: Cov txheej txheem thiab cov qauv kev sib txuas lus ntawm cov khoom siv
pob ntawv: Ib chav me me ntawm cov ntaub ntawv xa tawm hauv lub network
router: Ib qho khoom siv uas xa cov pob ntawv ntawm cov tes hauj lwm sib txawv
subnet mask: Siv los txiav txim siab txog lub network thiab host feem ntawm tus IP chaw nyob
topology: Kev teeb tsa ntawm cov khoom siv thiab kev sib txuas hauv lub network
Client server qauv: Network architecture qhov twg cov neeg thov kev pab los ntawm servers
dma ua: Kev nkag ncaj qha rau lub cim xeeb, tso cai rau cov khoom siv hloov cov ntaub ntawv yam tsis siv CPU
